spec.name: Marina Shopping Mall
spec.description: Marina Shopping Mall is a contemporary retail center located in the new Casablanca Marina district, near the port. The mall is a modern, integrated complex offering a wide selection of international and Moroccan retail brands, along with dining options and entertainment facilities. It is a key part of the new marina development, providing a modern shopping and leisure experience with views of the port and ocean.

timeline.title: Mall Opening
timeline.description: The Marina Shopping Mall officially opened to the public.
